ygData.subject: Re: AC and weight...
ygData.msgSnippet: Check out www.kadanit.com/eqmonks this site has a very good armor table. Kizmet Bayashi Monk of the 34th E. Marr ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Check out www.kadanit.com/eqmonks this site has a very good armor table.


Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 34th
E. Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: <Xurlus@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 24, 1999 10:56 AM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] AC and weight...


> From: Xurlus@...
>
> Hail all, I am a relatively new member of the EverQuest family.On the
E'Chi world I just reached 8th lvl, moments ago actualy, And have many Q's
regarding the intricacies of playing the ever loved Monk. I read in some of
the recent posts about AC-weight considerations and would like to "trim the
fat" so to speak from my armor.
> As of now I have a Leather, shirt, pants, shoulder, gloves, mask, cap, A
cloth cape a mesh bracers and raw hide boots. Now keeping in mind that I am
working with a tight budget, Nay, make that a VERY tight budget, what whould
be your suggestions on what I should keep/acquire.
> Thank you for your time.
> Zarvitz
> 8th lvl monk.
>
